<div class="bblp__container bblp__container--features" id="features">
<div class="bblp__row bblp__row--features clearfix">
<div class="bblp__col bblp__col--right">
<h1 class="bblp__row--features__title">Made to Fit Your Business</h1>
<div class="bblp__row--features__item">
<h2 class="bblp__row--features__subtitle"><i class="bblp__icon bblp__icon--savings"></i><br>Smart Savings</h2>
<p class="bblp__row--features__text">Your travelers can earn Genius discounts and perks for your company by booking 5 business trips. Plus, We Price Match!</p>
</div>
<div class="bblp__row--features__item bblp__row--features__item--middle">
<h2 class="bblp__row--features__subtitle"><i class="bblp__icon bblp__icon--customize"></i><br>Stay in Control</h2>
<p class="bblp__row--features__text">Track your spending by department, team or individual business traveler.</p>
</div>
<div class="bblp__row--features__item">
<h2 class="bblp__row--features__subtitle"><i class="bblp__icon bblp__icon--all-in-one"></i><br>All in One Place</h2>
<p class="bblp__row--features__text">Whether you're a Travel Organizer, or just traveling solo for business, get total oversight on all your bookings.</p>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<i class="bblp__visibility_mark" data-track-event-onview="onview - row features/product page"> </i>
</div>

<h2 class="bblp__row--usps__subtitle">Millions of Verified Business Reviews </h2>
<p class="bblp__row--usps__text">See what real business travelers had to say, with more verified guest reviews than any other platform out there.</p>
</div>
<div class="bblp__col bblp__row--usps-middle">
<i class="bblp__row--usps__icon bblp__icon bblp__icon--free"></i>
<h2 class="bblp__row--usps__subtitle">Completely FREE!</h2>
<p class="bblp__row--usps__text">No contracts, subscription costs or minimum bookings necessary – your Booking.com for Business account is totally free!</p>
</div>
